data.title: FIFA World Cup 2002 (USA v Mexico, USA v Germany)
data.meta_description: Brad Friedel - FIFA World Cup 2002 (USA v Mexico, USA v Germany), U.S.A.
data.text:
The above photo shows USA footballer Brad Friedel during the game against Mexico at the 2002 World Cup Finals

.USA 2:0 MEXICO (1:0) Brian McBride, Landon Donovan (17.06.02 Jeonju - 36, 380)

USA: Brad Friedel, Tony Sanneh, Eddie Pope, Greg Berhalter, Claudio Reyna (c), Pablo Mastroeni (92 Carlos Llamosa),

John O'Brien, Landon Donovan, Eddie Lewis, Josh Wolff (59 Earnie Stewart), Brian McBride (79 Cobi Jones)

.

MEXICO: Oscar Perez, Manuel Vidrio (h-t Sigifredo Mercado), Rafael Marquez (c), Salvador Carmona, Jesus Arellano,

Johan Rodriguez, Gerardo Torrado (78 Alberto Garcia Aspe 2nd c), Braulio Luna, Carlos Morales (28 Luis Hernandez),

Cuauhtemoc Blanco, Jared Borgetti (80 Francisco Palencia)

.

.

USA 0:1 GERMANY (0:1) (21.06.02 Ulsan - 37, 337)

USA: Brad Friedel, Tony Sanneh, Eddie Pope, Greg Berhalter, Frankie Hejduk (65 Cobi Jones),

Pablo Mastroeni (80 Earnie Stewart), Claudio Reyna (c), John O'Brien, Eddie Lewis, Landon Donovan, Brian McBride (58 Clint Mathis)

.

GERMANY: Oliver Kahn (c), Thomas Linke, Sebastian Kehl, Christoph Metzelder, Torsten Frings,

Bernd Schneider (60 Jens Jeremies), Dietmar Hamman, Michael Ballack, Christian Ziege, Oliver Neuville (80 Marco Bode),

Miroslav Klose (88 Oliver Bierhoff)

The above photo shows USA footballer Brad Friedel during the game against South Korea

at the 2002 World Cup Finals.

USA 1:1 SOUTH KOREA (1:0) Clint Mathis (10.06.02 Daegu - 60, 778)

USA: Brad Friedel, Tony Sanneh, Eddie Pope, Jeff Agoos, Frankie Hejduk, Landon Donovan, Claudio Reyna (c),

John O'Brien, DaMarcus Beasley (75 Eddie Lewis), Clint Mathis (83 Josh Wolff), Brian McBride

.

SOUTH KOREA: Lee Woon-Jae, Choi Jin-Cheul, Hong Myung-Bo (c), Kim Tae-Young, Song Chung-Gug, Kim Nam-Il,

Hwang Sun-Hong (56 Ahn Jung-Hwan), Yoo Sang-Chul (70 Choi Yong-Soo), Lee Eul-Young, Park Ji-Sung (38 Lee Chun-Soo), Seol Ki-Hyeon

.

.

USA 1:3 POLAND (0:2) Landon Donovan (14.06.02 Daejeon - 26, 482)

USA: Brad Friedel, Tony Sanneh, Eddie Pope, Jeff Agoos (36 DaMarcus Beasley), Frankie Hejduk,

Earnie Stewart (68 Cobi Jones), Claudio Reyna (c), John O'Brien, Landon Donovan, Clint Mathis, Brian McBride (58 Joe-Max Moore)

.

POLAND: Radoslaw Majdan, Tomasz Klos (89 Tomasz Waldoch), Arkadiusz Glowacki, Jacek Zielinski (c),

Marek Kozminski, Maciej Zurawski, Maciej Murawski, Cezary Kucharski (65 Marcin Zewlakow), Jacek Krzynowek,

Emmanuel Olisadebe (86 Pawel Sibik), Pawel Kryszalowicz .

The above photo shows USA footballer Brad Friedel during the game against Portugal

at the 2002 World Cup Finals. Picture George Herringshaw. Â©

USA 3:2 PORTUGAL (3:1)

05.06.02 Suwon, Suwon World Cup Stadium (Attendance - 37, 306)

.

USA: Brad Friedel, Tony Sanneh, Eddie Pope (80 Carlos Llamosa), Jeff Agoos, Frankie Hejduk, Earnie Stewart (c - h-t Cobi Jones), Pablo Mastroeni, John O'Brien, DaMarcus Beasley, Landon Donovan (75 Joe-Max Moore), Brian McBride

.

PORTUGAL: Vitor Baia, Beto Severo, Fernando Couto (c), Jorge Costa (74 Jorge Andrade), Rui Jorge (69 Paulo Bento), Luis Figo, Armando Petit, Manuel Rui Costa (80 Nuno Gomes), Sergio Conceicao, Pedro Pauleta, Joao Pinto

.

1:0 John O'Brien (3'02), 2:0 Jorge Costa own goal (28'57), 3:0 Brian McBride (35'51), 3:1 Beto Severo (38'36), 3:2 Jeff Agoos own goal (70'18)

.

booked - DaMarcus Beasley / Beto Severo, Armando Petit. Referee - Byron Moreno Ruales (Ecuador)

.
